titleStmt.title: A new discouery of personal tithes: or The tenth part of mens cleere gaines Proued due both in conscience, and by the lawes of this kingdome. By C. Burges.
titleStmt.author: Burges, Cornelius, 1589?-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. L[egat] for William Sheffard, and are to be sold at his shop, at the entring in of Popes-head Aley, out of Lumbard street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the entring in of Popes-head Aley, out of Lumbard street
